title: H. Lee Morgan, Warlock (Complete Works) - sam2085

# Death Incarnate Saga (5 Books)

# Balancer's Cycle Saga (4 Books) 
Books Ã¢â€ â€™ Balancer's Soul (1), Changer's Blood (2), Keeper's Knowledge (3), Harmonizer's Evolution (4)

Death Incarnate Saga 01 Grin of Prophecy ; Published August 15th 2013
On the run from exacting vengeance on a traitorous general for the loss of his team that was betrayed, Cage soon finds himself unable to escape. Then out of nowhere he is sucked to another world. A world where magic exists and no longer is he bound to a wheelchair. with a new lease on life he does what any man would do, look for a fight and resist urges from beautiful women. *Adult themes and content*

01 Untamed Gift ; Published September 8th 2012
Alex always found his life miserable and useless since he wasn't born with an item, but after a fated encounter with a fair warrior woman and a near death episode he meets Shade, a Shadow Fang, and so starts their journey to break the oppressive shackles of a tyrannical king, save a friend and help change the fate of the lands.

Balancer's Cycle Saga 01 Balancer's Soul ; Published January 17th 2012
Finding your other half is the most difficult journey anyone can undertake. It gets doubly so if you aren't exactly normal. Connor and Sarah both have this same problem, but for different reasons. Their fated encounter will turn their world, and that of many others, upside down. Her abilities and his strength set them apart, but also bring them together like no other.

About this author...
I'm Lee, as a child I've always had a vivid imagination, but it wasn't until I was in a swimming accident and becoming paralyzed due to having my neck broken at the age of 14 that I could bring my imagination to life, through writing. My life has undoubtedly been harsher than others, being forced to live in a wheelchair and all, but my imagination, personality and drive to continue has helped me to write. It's impossible to know if I'd still write if not for being a quadriplegic, but I've come to enjoy writing and sharing my passion and stories with others.
